title: PSA: SQLite WAL checksums fail silently and may lose data
description: SQLite WAL has checksums, but on corruption it drops all the data and does not raise error
content:
22 Jul 2025
This is a follow-up post to my PSA: SQLite does not do checksums and PSA: Most databases do not do checksums by default. In the previous posts I mentioned that SQLite does not do checksu… [+4953 chars]
